entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 18 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14 except minus 18 inland. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
